author: Peter Hodson
title: The Lockdown Portfolio: Five stocks positioned to outperform if COVID-19 social distancing drags on
description: Peter Hodson: Some of these stocks have run hard already, and in a post-COVID world might seriously underperform, but for now, they're looking good
content:
